website_summaries.verdict: In addition to loads of extras, this option is durable, attractive, and relatively easy to assemble.
pros: The double-vented canopy is water resistant  and fire retardant, while the frame is made of powder-coated steel
Extras include a bottle opener, LED lighting, and utensil hooks
cons: This gazebo can be a bit too lightweight
Consider buying an anchoring solution to go with it

customer_reviews.title: Amazing cover !
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for night grilling as well as grilling in the rain. I’ve grilled under it at least 15 times since getting in a couple weeks ago. Took me and my daughter about 25 minutes to put it together. If you want to grill at night or under the rain then you need this.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Topper

customer_reviews.title: I like it!!
customer_reviews.text: We like it, it looks good in the yard It was easy to assemble. I'm 70+ years old and had no trouble. The instructions are simple, but easy to follow. The hardware come in individual labeled packs so it was easy to know what went where I even had parts left over. The only complaint that I have is that the tool hanger couldn't be attached. The holes in the hanger didn't match up to the holes in the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: James Mayo

customer_reviews.title: Broken part replaced within 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: A weld was found broken on the hub for the top pieces. I contacted the manufacturer with a photo of the weld and my Amazon purchase order number. 13 days later I received the part. Excellent service and response. This will make a perfect sun/ rain shelter for my grill assembly was simple and quick.
customer_reviews.author: William McMillian

customer_reviews.title: Happy overall
customer_reviews.text: Nor Cal weather doesn't seem to phase it. Just needed a little more anchor. I have yet to remove my canopy this winter
customer_reviews.author: MJD

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: A little more unstable than I was hoping for but overall good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jason C Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great buy, easy to build, a little challenging putting the top on but with patience and an extra hand it can be easily done. And it came with a free light.
customer_reviews.author: diana

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband. He loves it. Very sturdy and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: K-Lo

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Like how perfectly it fits over my grill! Super convenient and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Rice

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love my new gazebo, got so many compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Internet Queen

customer_reviews.title: Rusted
customer_reviews.text: The product was rusted and bent . I had to return it .
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Gonzalez

product_meta.title: MASTERCANOPY Patio Gazebo Waterproof Soft-Top Steel Garden Gazebo Tent Lawn, Backyard and Deck
product_meta.description: 【RUSTPROOF STEEL FRAME】: 6 poles supports at the top. Gazebo shelf is firmer and effectively prevents water accumulation at the top. Stable，Steel and rustproof frame, Frame surface by durable and powder coated finish. All materials are built to last.
feature_bullets: 【RUSTPROOF STEEL FRAME】: 6 poles supports at the top. Gazebo shelf is firmer and effectively prevents water accumulation at the top. Stable，Steel and rustproof frame, Frame surface by durable and powder coated finish. All materials are built to last.
【GRILL GAZEBO SIZE】: L96. 1 x W59. 8 xH96. 5in, Length and width are measured according to the top shelf. This grill gazebo package includes 1×Steel frame, 1× Grill gazebo top.

【GRILL GAZEBO TOP】: Vented, double-tiered canopy offers smoke ventilation and stability against windy conditions-Ventilated and Breathable. The grill cover is made from Rip Lock fabric. UV treated, water resistant, CPAI-84 fire retardant, Please rest assured to purchase.
【RATIONAL DESIGN】: Two handy shelves for grill accessories, beverages or food, 8' x 5' footprint gives enough room to accommodate most grills. Perfect choice for BBQ.
【FREE GIFT WITH PURCHASE】Give away an adsorbable lamp(ONLY ONE)
